name: MovieBoxPro for AltStore
subtitle: MovieBoxPro Unoffical Altstore source.
description: This is an auto-updating Altstore source for MovieBoxPro [ Github: https://github.com/Hann8n/JackCracks/tree/main ]

apps.name: MovieBoxPro
apps.subtitle: Watch Movies and TV for free with MovieBoxPro
apps.localizedDescription: MovieBoxPro is a best in-class streaming service. Enjoy Movies and TV on your phone or cast to your smartTV.

privacy.name: Camera
privacy.usageDescription: App may ask to use camera.

privacy.name: BluetoothAlways
privacy.usageDescription: App may ask to use Bluetooth.

privacy.name: LocationWhenInUse
privacy.usageDescription: App may ask for location when app is in use. (Not Recommended)

privacy.name: LocalNetwork
privacy.usageDescription: App may ask to use Local Network, required when casting.

privacy.name: Microphone
privacy.usageDescription: App may ask to use microphone.

privacy.name: BluetoothPeripheral
privacy.usageDescription: App may ask to access peripheral bluetooth devices, such as a remote.

privacy.name: LocationAlwaysAndWhenInUse
privacy.usageDescription: App may ask for location at all times. (Not Recommended)

privacy.name: LocationAlways
privacy.usageDescription: App may ask for location when running in background. (Not Recommended)

privacy.name: PhotoLibraryAdd
privacy.usageDescription: App may ask to add photos to photo library.

privacy.name: PhotoLibrary
privacy.usageDescription: App may ask to access photo library.

privacy.name: UserTracking
privacy.usageDescription: App may ask to track user. (Not Recommended)

news.title: MovieBoxPro is on Altstore 2.0!
news.caption: Source has been updated to support Altstore 2.0
